signals.problem_statement: The customer needs to standardize email management processes across their team to improve efficiency and reduce manual handling of emails.
signals.context: Team of 30-40 people using distribution lists for email management, with plans to expand to 60-70.

signals.problem_statement: There is a lack of visibility into email handling and performance metrics, making it difficult to track response times and workload distribution.
signals.context: Current email management lacks analytics to measure response times and completion rates.

signals.problem_statement: The customer experiences workflow friction due to inconsistent email sorting and handling methods among team members.
signals.context: Different team members use various methods to manage their inboxes, leading to confusion and inefficiency.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for AI capabilities to automate email sorting and responses based on specific criteria.
signals.context: The team is interested in using AI to streamline email management and improve response times.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a solution that integrates with Outlook for email management but is concerned about the lack of calendar integration.
signals.context: Currently using Outlook for email management and requires calendar functionality.
